questTheSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
questTheSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

questTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
questTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
questTheSpire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

questTheSpire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
questTheSpire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

questTheSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
questTheSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !questTheSpire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

questTheSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
questTheSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !questTheSpire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

questTheSpire:AlchemistFire.NAME: Alchemist Fire
questTheSpire:AlchemistFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to random enemies. Add a Burn to the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

questTheSpire:Carbuncle.NAME: Carbuncle
questTheSpire:Carbuncle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL Lose 3 Max HP.
questTheSpire:Carbuncle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL Lose 3 Max HP.

questTheSpire:EntSpirit.NAME: Ent Spirit
questTheSpire:EntSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Stun an Enemy. NL Exhaust.
questTheSpire:EntSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Stun an Enemy. NL Exhaust.

questTheSpire:FangSpirit.NAME: Wolf Spirit
questTheSpire:FangSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When played permanently increase damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

questTheSpire:Ifrit.NAME: Ifrit
questTheSpire:Ifrit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 1 Max HP.

questTheSpire:Leviathan.NAME: Leviathan
questTheSpire:Leviathan.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL Lose 1 Max HP.
questTheSpire:Leviathan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL Lose 1 Max HP.

questTheSpire:Quezacotl.NAME: Quezacotl
questTheSpire:Quezacotl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Lose 1 Max HP.

questTheSpire:Shiva.NAME: Shiva
questTheSpire:Shiva.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Blur. NL Lose 1 Max HP.

questTheSpire:Yojimbo.NAME: Yojimbo
questTheSpire:Yojimbo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold. NL Lose 1 Max HP.
